trends: There has been one other sighting in Lincolnshire
There were no other sightings in Lincolnshire on or around August 8th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsmy husband and i was traveling to newark, stoped 4 a burger.as we sat in the car we saw lights come up from behinde the buildings across the way.we thought at firt they was hot air ballons but they all went on the same line there was no fire or anything that said they was hot air ballons.we got out of the car and watched could not make them out .not only there was 1 but 8 going up a few seconds between each one. there was other people stoping and looking as they was amazed to wot they was and that was that. they had gone way out of sight in the distance.my husband and i said they are not flars or ballons they was just strange???? and so we went and carried oneating and went on our way to milton keynes. we did not take photos but we will never forget wot we saw
Summary: just orange |gold like fire orb there was 8 came up and fly the same way many people saw them
